description: Compressed FLAC data encapsulated in an Ogg transport layer,which helps overcome certain shortcomings of the transport system elements included in the "native FLAC" format.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Ogg FLAC Audio Format, Version 1.0
